name: La Casa Gelato
address: 1033 Venables St, Vancouver, BC V6A 3R9, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Gelato & Sorbetto (Half Litre)
hasMenuItem.description: Gelato is made with dairy, milk, and cream. Sorbetto is dairy-free, water base, and made with natural fruit puree. We hold the world record of 238 flavors of gelato and sorbetto. Voted the best in the lower mainland

hasMenuItem.name: Homemade Cake Balls
hasMenuItem.description: Homemade in-house cake balls made to perfection and dipped in rich chocolate. Available in all different flavors

hasMenuItem.name: Gelato & Sorbetto (Double Cup)
hasMenuItem.description: Gelato is made with dairy, milk, and cream. Sorbetto is dairy-free, water base, and made with natural fruit puree. We hold the world record of 238 flavors of gelato and sorbetto. Voted the best in the lower mainland

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Marshmallow Stix
hasMenuItem.description: Handmade fluffy marshmallows dipped in chocolate and drizzled with white chocolate. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: Sicilian Traditional Cannoli
hasMenuItem.description: La casa gelato's iconic original Sicilian cannoli. Crisp, flaky Italian pastry, filled with sweet ricotta cream, chocolate chips and dusted with icing sugar. The classic Italian dessert that we're famous for. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: Gelato & Sorbetto (Single Cup)
hasMenuItem.description: Gelato is made with dairy, milk, and cream. Sorbetto is dairy-free, water base, and made with natural fruit puree. We hold the world record of 238 flavors of gelato and sorbetto. Voted the best in the lower mainland

hasMenuItem.name: Gelato & Sorbetto (Triple Cup)
hasMenuItem.description: Gelato is made with dairy, milk, and cream. Sorbetto is dairy-free, water base, and made with natural fruit puree. We hold the world record of 238 flavors of gelato and sorbetto. Voted the best in the lower mainland

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Caramel Cluster
hasMenuItem.description: In-house made, rich chocolate with creamy caramel and topped with salted roasted pecans or macadamia nuts. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: White Chocolate Caramel Cluster
hasMenuItem.description: In-house made, rich white chocolate with creamy caramel and topped with salted roasted pecans or macadamia nuts. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Dipped Strawberry
hasMenuItem.description: Long Stem Strawberries hand dipped in semi-sweet chocolate and white chocolate drizzle. The perfectly sweet gift for someone special

hasMenuItem.name: Waffle Cone (4 Pk)
hasMenuItem.description: La casa gelato's family recipe. Homemade Italian pizzelle cookie, made fresh in house,  rolled into a perfect waffle cones

hasMenuItem.name: Skor Chocolate Pretzel Stix
hasMenuItem.description: Perfectly sweet and a little touch of a salt, our pretzel sticks are dipped in chocolate, creamy caramel and covered with skor candy bar bits. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: White Chocolate Caramel Cluster
hasMenuItem.description: In-house made, rich white chocolate with creamy caramel and topped with salted roasted pecans or macadamia nuts. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Caramel Waffle Stix
hasMenuItem.description: Our famous waffle cone rolled up into a stick, dipped in creamy caramel, and topped with roasted almond or toasted coconut. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Rice Crispy Bar
hasMenuItem.description: Classic rice crips in melted marshmallows dipped in chocolate and sprinkles. Available in original or with peanut butter. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: Sweets Mix & Match (6 Pieces)
hasMenuItem.description: Mix and match any of the treats listed. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: Sweets Mix & Match (12 Pieces)
hasMenuItem.description: Mix and match any of the treats listed. La casa gelato's Italian pastries are handmade in-house using only the finest ingredients

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Dipped Strawberry
hasMenuItem.description: Long Stem Strawberries hand dipped in semi-sweet chocolate and white chocolate drizzle. The perfectly sweet gift for someone special

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Caramel Apples
hasMenuItem.description: Granny smith apple dipped in creamy caramel, rich chocolate, coated with your choice of roasted almonds, English toffee, or Oreo cookies

hasMenuItem.name: Homemade Cake Balls Mix & Match (6 Pcs)
hasMenuItem.description: Homemade in-house cake balls made to perfection and dipped in rich chocolate. Available in all different flavors

hasMenuItem.name: Homemade Cake Balls
hasMenuItem.description: Homemade in-house cake balls made to perfection and dipped in rich chocolate. Available in all different flavors

hasMenuItem.name: Homemade Almond Brittle
hasMenuItem.description: Cherry's famous almond brittle. Slowed roasted almonds perfected into brittle candy

hasMenuItem.name: Round Gelato Cake (7'')
hasMenuItem.description: Gelato flavors are layered on top of each flavor with a thinly sliced vanilla sponge cake on the bottom. Decorated to perfection. Available in different flavors

review.reviewBody: Homemade Cake Balls are Soo Delicious and Fresh. I love Peach Bellini and Hedgehog, my favourites!!
Gelato is always freshly made. Delicious flavours!
First te trying La Casa Gelato. The gelato & sorbeto and the white chocolate caramel cluster were DELICIOUS!!!
always so delicious and correct orders
